introduction: My name is Matěj Holman. I am a {{age}} year old computer science student originally from Liberec. I currently live and study in Prague.
aboutText: I have education in information technology complemented by several months of practical experience in the field. I continuously educate myself and expand my knowledge. My main programming languages are <u>C#</u> and <u>JavaScript</u>, but I'm also proficient in <u>Python</u> and <u>SQL</u>. I have extensive experience with libraries/frameworks such as <u>React</u> and <u>React Native</u>, as well as the <u>ASP.NET</u> platform. I am capable of working on both front-end and back-end development. My language skills include a certified <u>C1</u> level proficiency in English. I am ready to apply my skills and further develop in a dynamic IT environment.
school: Secondary Technical School and Higher Vocational School, Liberec
uni: University of Economics, Faculty of Informatics and Statistics, Prague
job1Description: Company internship, assistance in the IT department
job2Description: Implementation of web application designs for company clients, front-end design, HTML, CSS & JavaScript
job3Description: Development and maintenance of web applications, worked with htmx and alpine.js, Erasmus
project1Description: A meal planning app for easier nutrition overview and achieving weight goals, React Native and Expo
project2Description: Front-end of a website for a bistro, made for Kassua studio
project3Description: Front-end of a website for an architectural studio, made for Kassua studio
project4Description: Front-end of a main page for prague football club's 30 year celebration, made for Kassua studio
project5Description: Web application for uploading and viewing images from different users, ASP.NET, C#
